rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Because of the skirmishes between
Invidia and Superbia, we were
forced to leave our island.

rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I was taken in by Vandham, but there
were others who went to Acedia.

rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I wonder which was the better
choice? Here, or Acedia?

rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But still... Acedia seems
like it'd be better.

rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a city... and it has the
divine protection of His
Holiness Marveni, you know?

rows.label: tlk41100141_03_msg0006
rows.name:
...Adults are mostly untrustworthy,
but I think he might be different.
